mapper.select: /* terms.findListUserTermsAgreeHistory : 약관동의 이력 목록 조회*/ SELECT TCMA. TERMCND_UUID ,(CASE WHEN MULT.CTMPL_NM IS NULL THEN (SELECT CTMPL_NM FROM CTMPL_MULTLANG WHERE TEN_ID = TCMA.TEN_ID AND TCMA.CTMPL_UUID = MULT.CTMPL_UUID AND LANG_CCD = 'ko_KR') ELSE MULT.CTMPL_NM END) AS CTMPL_NM , TCMA.TERMCND_REN_REVNO , VDGL.VD_CD , VDGL.VD_NM , USR.USR_ID , USR.USR_NM , CHTC.TERMCND_CNST_DTTM , CHTC.TERMCND_CNST_YN , CHTC.TERMCND_UUID , CHTC.TERMCND_CNST_UUID FROM TERMCND TCMA INNER JOIN TERMCND_CNST_HISTREC CHTC ON CHTC.TEN_ID = TCMA.TEN_ID AND CHTC.CTMPL_UUID = TCMA.CTMPL_UUID AND CHTC.TERMCND_UUID = TCMA.TERMCND_UUID INNER JOIN USR USR ON USR.TEN_ID = CHTC.TEN_ID AND USR.USR_ID = CHTC.TERMCND_CNST_USR_UUID LEFT OUTER JOIN CTMPL_MULTLANG MULT ON TCMA.TEN_ID = MULT.TEN_ID AND TCMA.CTMPL_UUID = MULT.CTMPL_UUID AND MULT.LANG_CCD = #{g.locale} LEFT OUTER JOIN VD VDGL ON VDGL.TEN_ID = USR.TEN_ID AND VDGL.VD_CD = USR.VD_CD WHERE CHTC.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND CHTC.CTMPL_UUID = #{p.ctmpl_uuid} AND CHTC.TERMCND_UUID = #{p.termcnd_uuid} ORDER BY CHTC.TERMCND_CNST_DTTM DESC
